about.summary: An MNE project for organizing and formatting MEG and EEG data according to the BIDS specification

name: mne-bids
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mne-bids" %}
{% set version = "0.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 187add419562e3607c161eaf04971863c134febad2e70313260a58238e519ba5

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - nibabel
    - mne

test:
  imports:
    - mne_bids

about:
  home: https://mne.tools/mne-bids/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'An MNE project for organizing and formatting MEG and EEG data according to the BIDS specification'
  dev_url: https://github.com/mne-tools/mne-bids

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hoechenberger
    - jasmainak
